title: Topic 001 Question 048
body: Your company has the divisions shown in the following table.
Sub1 contains an Azure App Service web app named App1. App1 uses Azure AD for single-tenant user authentication. Users from contoso.com can authenticate to App1.
You need to recommend a solution to enable users in the fabrikam.com tenant to authenticate to App1.
options: Use Azure AD entitlement management to govern external users.
Enable Azure AD pass-through authentication and update the sign-in endpoint.
Configure assignments for the fabrikam.com users by using Azure AD Privileged Identity Management (PIM).
